_schema.description: Ground truth data for OCR benchmark evaluation

interview_passport.jpg.description: Adversarial Sample (Michelle De La Paz) - Visual DOB (1999) does not match MRZ DOB (1964). Visual Expiry (Feb) does not match MRZ Expiry (Dec).
interview_passport.jpg.notes: Visual DOB is 1999-08-07, but MRZ '640117' decodes to 1964-01-17. Visual Expiry is 2018-02-05, but MRZ '181205' decodes to 2018-12-05.

Passport Front.pdf.description: Valid Indian Passport (Nikhil Nigam) - Standard scan, high quality.

attested passport.pdf.description: Valid Indian Passport embedded in California Jurat (Notarized). System must isolate passport region from notary text.

adding_images: 1. Place test image in this directory (test_data/)
2. Add entry to 'images' object with filename as key
3. Fill in expected values (use null if extraction should fail)
4. Set expects_human_review: true for adversarial cases
5. List expected_fraud_flags that should be triggered
